d3feef25-2284-402a-a631-a18a2b15d209.title: Note
d3feef25-2284-402a-a631-a18a2b15d209.text: Find out at which point he disapears in-game?

2f8dc75d-5f00-4980-927b-277542c4c60d.text: You felt something but it slipped through your fingers...

9db7335f-2fab-46c1-8903-b8cc28d6b3a6.text: You find a small amount of sand.

678c69c2-26ef-466d-abc0-ab556467c236.text: You rummage around in Sandy's pockets...

42f37dd5-f0fc-47dd-9ea9-301048a88ebc.title: Sandy
42f37dd5-f0fc-47dd-9ea9-301048a88ebc.text:
I'm Sandy of Sandy's Sand Corp, are you in the sand
business?

bb014701-16a6-4f6f-83b1-506af8e03f07.title: Sandy
bb014701-16a6-4f6f-83b1-506af8e03f07.text: Nice day for sand isn't it?

1dd47afd-34cd-45b6-a1b9-0d2f0c336dbe.title: Sandy
1dd47afd-34cd-45b6-a1b9-0d2f0c336dbe.text:
Sand is yellow,
Sand is grand,
Sand puts money,
In my hand!

f9ec8f38-f666-43ba-9a1b-8aac4c68494a.title: Sandy
f9ec8f38-f666-43ba-9a1b-8aac4c68494a.text: I don't have time to talk to you. Go away!

edc75d0c-76df-4766-a7b7-7b8e94730b47.title: <player>
edc75d0c-76df-4766-a7b7-7b8e94730b47.text: Hello Sir, do you run the Sand Corp?

5eed2586-192b-4de2-8d0d-004dd1e90120.title: <player>
5eed2586-192b-4de2-8d0d-004dd1e90120.text:
I'm <player>. I'm here investigating the possible
murder of a wizard.

57fa6fb3-8678-4a87-b1c2-b5d0d614d5ac.title: Sandy
57fa6fb3-8678-4a87-b1c2-b5d0d614d5ac.text:
I don't care about that, I have far too much work to
do. Let the authorities take care of things like murder
and stop snooping around my office!

abc991d4-c14b-453f-8c34-61421a0803b0.text:
Sandy seems very keen to get you out of the office, perhaps you
should take a look around.

46742681-2625-40ac-984a-6c185096173a.text:
You already have the rota, perhaps you should take both rotas back
to Bert in Yanille.

50c69f17-11f8-4f2c-a0f5-4d63db6f2307.title: Sandy
50c69f17-11f8-4f2c-a0f5-4d63db6f2307.text: I don't have time to talk to you. Go away!

options.text: There's a herd of huge mutant herring about to drop from the sky!
But the pygmy shrews have eaten all the sand!
A small parrot with a pink banana is sitting outside your window!

17e2abfb-4f11-4e2c-b2fa-58ff0c4c69a8.title: <player>
17e2abfb-4f11-4e2c-b2fa-58ff0c4c69a8.text:
There's a herd of huge mutant herring about to drop
from the sky!

80a79214-d806-40f4-a438-9dcf7c8bbdb0.title: Sandy
80a79214-d806-40f4-a438-9dcf7c8bbdb0.text: I'm not falling for that one!

ee083f7c-a36d-4782-9c4c-faa90aa945a8.title: <player>
ee083f7c-a36d-4782-9c4c-faa90aa945a8.text: But the pygmy shrews have eaten all the sand!

fab3a491-668a-4675-b620-20dadd309448.title: <player>
fab3a491-668a-4675-b620-20dadd309448.text:
A small parrot with a pink banana is sitting outside your
window!

71aa94f5-aeec-440f-b296-70d0e75c355a.text:
You pour the serum into Sandy's coffee, then a little while later
watch him drink it.

args: Sandy turns to look out of the window, now is your chance!

71eba284-8b7e-4d77-805c-d4cd0eb11d90.text:
You need to activate the magical scrying orb, obtained from the
wizard in Yanille, to capture the conversation with Sandy!

7d7c7afe-1dbf-456d-bcb1-a65ccc7b4dd3.title: <player>
7d7c7afe-1dbf-456d-bcb1-a65ccc7b4dd3.text:
Now, I'm going to ask you some questions and I want
you to answer me truthfully...

options.text: Why is Bert's rota different from the original?
Why doesn't Bert remember the change in his hours?

065e0bf4-c1be-4413-98fe-f0a089fa3678.title: <player>
065e0bf4-c1be-4413-98fe-f0a089fa3678.text: Why doesn't Bert remember the change in his hours?

2691790f-c9b1-4804-bc75-7e2f6dd1803b.title: Sandy
2691790f-c9b1-4804-bc75-7e2f6dd1803b.text:
Because.... because.... I bribed a wizard to put a spell
on him so he would believe everything I say!!

235287db-6499-400b-a52f-53b20aed87a9.title: Sandy
235287db-6499-400b-a52f-53b20aed87a9.text:
So that I could make him work longer without paying
him more!

a53acca4-14eb-4b7e-bfae-6f1c00452282.title: Sandy
a53acca4-14eb-4b7e-bfae-6f1c00452282.text:
I...I... I KILLED HIM! So I wouldn't have to pay him
and no one would know. I put his body in the next
load of sand.

8727af14-e210-4b9d-8aab-2d1c7135d676.title: <player>
8727af14-e210-4b9d-8aab-2d1c7135d676.text: Why is Bert's rota different from the original?

80ee6de8-8899-4603-9930-73e7273e8f15.title: <player>
80ee6de8-8899-4603-9930-73e7273e8f15.text:
I think I have enough evidence now, you can go for
now, but I think you're up to your neck in it!

6b68ee7d-71d7-45b7-9802-208b80f9f283.text:
Sandy has told you all he knows. The magical scrying
orb is full and needs to be returned to the Wizard in
Yanille.

600dd25e-2081-406a-a4f3-c9f9621e575e.text: You need to ask Sandy all the questions.
